resources: Oxygen Updater Oxygen Updater Update Cerrar No hay ninguna información oficial sobre las nuevas caracterísicas que esta actualización ofrece. Normalmente, tal actualización proporciona correcciones de errores, mejoras de rendimiento, y / o actualizaciones de seguridad para tu disposiivo. Nombre del archivo: %1$s para Actualizar Actualizar La última actualización del sistema es: Última comprobación el: %1$s Una nueva actualización del sistema está disponible: No hay ninguna información de la actualización. Versión de Oxygen OS: %1$s Tu sistema está actualizado. Actualización sin nombre para el %1$s  versión: Ver las caracterísicas de la actualización Algunas caracterísicas no funcionan . El servidor no es accesible. Intenta recargar la página. Algunas caracterísicas puede que no funcionen correctamente. ¡Hay una nueva actualización disponible! ¡La versión %1$s ha sido publicada! at Hoy Ayer Descarga Descargado Descargando Pausado La actualización ya fue descargada. Está lista para ser instalada. Descarga completa Descarga completa. Pulsa para comenzar la instalación. Oxygen Updater Error de Descarga CERRAR ¡El archivo de la actualización está dañado! Por favor, intenta descargarlo de nuevo. Ha ocurrido un error de conexión mientras se descargaba la actualización. La descarga se reanudará automáticamentete. Ha ocurrido un error en el servidor mientras se descargaba la actualización. Por favor, intenta descargar la actualización de nuevo. Desafortunadamente, un error técnico ha ocurrido mientras se descargaba la actualización. Intenta descargarla de nuevo. Si el error no desaparece, por favor contaca con el desarrollador de esta app para obtener asistencia. REINTENTAR RESUMIR No hay suficiente espacio en el disposiivo para descargar la actualización. Por favor, elimina algunos archivos e inténtalo de nuevo. Descarga fallida Oxygen Updater se esá ejecuando en segundo plano Versión de Oxygen OS La descarga comenzará pronto… Pulsa Descargar de nuevo para descargar la actualización. Descarga pausada a causa de una pérdida de conexión. Esta se resumirá en breve. Error en el servidor mientras se descargaba. Por favor, reinicia la descarga. Error técnico mientras se descargaba. Reinicia la descarga o conacta con el soporte. Insuficiente almacenamiento disponible. Verificación del archivo fallida. Comprueba tu conexión a Internet e inténtalo de nuevo. %1$d%%, cerca de %2$d horas restantes %1$d%%, menos de un minuto resantte %1$d%%, cerca de %2$d minutos restanes %1$d%%, cerca de 1 hora restante %1$d%%, cerca de un minuto restante %1$d%%, unos pocos segundos restantes %1$d%%, calculando el timepo resante… 100%, verificando archivo… %1$d%%, pausado %1$d%%, esperando a una conexión a Internet… %1$d MB Actualización de Oxygen OS Verificando… El archivo está dañado La descarga se verificará ahora… Ajustes Comprar (%1$s) Comprado No disponible Actualizar a la versión sin publicidad: Ayuda a mejorar la app: Contribuir Otros: Disposiivo Error al guardar tus preferencias. Por favor, regresa y seleciona tu dispositivo de nuevo / método para actualizarlo de nuevo. An incremental update can be installed from any version (except if you have an unlocked bootloader; then you should always pick the full update as update method).\n\nA beta update of OxygenOS can always be installed, as well when you\'re on a stable version. To switch from stable to beta, you have to enable the advanced mode in the settings. For the betas, the full and incremental update methods work the same way as on the stable versions. Explicación de los métodos de actualización] Escoge tu disposiivo y el método para actualizarlo: Enviarme una nottificación cuando: Mensaje crítico disponible Actualización del sistema disponible Nuevo disposiivo soportado Una nueva noticia ha sido publicada Tus preferencias son guardadas automáticamente. Tus preferencias todavía se están guardando. Si tarda mucho tiempo: Comprueba tu conexión a Internet, sal de la app e iníciala de nuevo. Mostrar mensajes en la aplicación cuando: Hay noticias o avisos Una nueva versión de la app está disponible Otros ajustes: Modo avanzado Presiona este botón para obtener más información sobre el modo avanzado. El modo avanzado oculta el mensaje \"Tu sisema está actualizado\", permitiendote descargar e instalar todas las actualizaciones, Incluso cuando estas no sean compatibles con tu dispositivo.\n\nESto puede resultar útil cuando:\n- Actualices a una versión beta desde la versión estable\n- Vuelvas de la versión beta a la estable (no olvides hacer un reseteo de fábrica)\n- Reinstales tu versión del sistema actual. Método de actualización Comparte con nosoteros datos de uso y registros FAQ FAQ Sin conexión a Internet. Necesitas una conexión a Internet para ver el FAQ. Bienvenido iniciar app ¡Bienvenido a Oxygen Updater! Esta app te permitirá:\n\n- Acceder rápidamente a nuevas actualizaciones para tu Oneplus gracias a OxygenOS\n\n- Actualiza fácilmente tu disposiivo con acceso root\n\n- Ver las novedades del sistema operativo que estás usando actualmente\n\n- Leer las últimas noticias sobre OnePlus y OxygenOS\n\nDesliza a la izquierda para continuar. Aviso importante: Esta no es una aplicación oficial de Oneplus. El uso de esta app está sujeto a tu propia responsabilidad. Ni Oneplus ni el desarrollador son responsables de tu acciones, incluyendo el daño causado por esta app. \n\nAl usar esta app, aceptas los términos y condiciones arriba mencionados.\n\nDesliza a la izquierda pata continuar. Elige tu dispositivo: Tu dispositivo suele selecionarse automáticamente. Si no es así, seleciona tu dispositivo arriba.\n\nDesliza a la izquierda pata continuar. Elige el método para actualizar: Normalmente, the incremental update is the right choice here, because it offers much faster and smaller downloads.\n\nHowever, it\'s not compatible with rooted devices. If you have a rooted device, choose the Full update.\n\nIf you have a beta version of OxygenOS, choose (one of) the Open Beta update method(s).\n\nDesliza a la izquierda pata continuar. ¡Ya estás listo para comenzar! ¡Disfruta esta app!\n\nSiempre podrás cambiar las preferencias más tarde. Para hacerlo: Haz click en los tres puntos en la esquina derecha, y seleciona \"Ajustes\". Instalar Comprobando su tu dispositivo tiene acceso root… Por favor, permite el acceso root cuando se te requiera. Desafortunadamente ahora no puedes volver atrás Preparando la instalación… Update Installer   Backing up your device. This will take a while! Clearing the cache partition… Done. Your device will restart. Installing the additional ZIP file… Installing the update… Thank you for using Oxygen Updater. If you like this app, please rate it 5 stars at Google Play :-) "Failed to prepare the installation of the update. Did you allow root access?" Backup my device You may customize the installation process by changing the options shown below. Tap on \'Start installation\' to start the installation of the update. Keep my device rooted Reboot after installation Select the root package to install… Start installation Choose your install options Wipe the cache partition What do these options mean? Backup my device:\nWhen you select this option, a backup of your system, apps and settings will be made prior to the installation. Always handy to have, in case something goes horribly wrong. Keep my device rooted:\nWhen you select this option, you may specify a root package which will be installed after the update is installed. This ensures that your device stays rooted. Please note that this root package must be compatible with the NEW OxygenOS version you are going to install! Wipe the cache partition:\nWhen you select this option, the cache partition will be wiped after the update has been installed. This ensures your device performs optimally and also reduces the likelihood of experiencing bugs caused by the installation of the update. Reboot after installation:\nWhen you select this option, your device will automatically reboot back to OxygenOS after the update is installed. Otherwise, your device will stay in Recovery Mode, where you can install additional packages. How do you want to install this update? Automatic installation* Automatic installation image The easiest way to install the update.\nYour device will restart to install the update.\n\n* Requires root access and TWRP recovery. Manual installation Manual installation image Read the install guide to learn how to install the update. You will install the update using the Recovery Mode of your device. A temporary error occurred while preparing the installation of the update. Please try it again. Installation failed Error when installing the update. No changes were made to the software of your device. Try installing the update again. Failed to check if the update was installed successfully. Please open Oxygen Updater to see if the update was installed successfully. A different version of OxygenOS was installed. Don\'t select an OxygenOS update file when choosing a root package under the "Keep my device rooted" option. Installation complete OxygenOS version %1$s has been installed successfully. Clear root package file Choose root package file Select a root package… You may only select a zip file. Please select the right file. Install the update according to the instructions shown in the install guide. Automatic installations have been temporarily disabled due to reported technical issues. Install the update according to the instructions shown in the install guide. Install guide Loading the installation guide … Install guide - %1$d of %2$d Contextual image. Please tap on a lower place on the screen to hear the install guide. Swipe <- -> to navigate between pages. - It\'s recommended to write all steps down, as you\'ll need to power off your device during the installation of the update. Download the update. - Press the Download button to start downloading the update.\n\n- The download progress will appear in the app, and as a notification in your notifications screen.\n\n- When the download has finished, you\'ll see a notification with the text \"Download complete\".\nIf a download error occurred, open the app and try to downloading the update again. If this doesn\'t work, make sure you have a working connection. Otherwise, contact the developer of the app. You can do this by visiting the \"My apps\" section of the Google Play Store. Enter Recovery Mode. - First, power off your device.\n\n- Then, press both the power and the volume down buttons at the same time.\n\n- Your device will now start in Recovery Mode. Wait until you see the recovery menu on your screen. Install the downloaded update. - Within the recovery menu, choose your desired language first. Next, tap on (or use the volume buttons to navigate and the power button to select) \"Install from SD\".\n\n- Next, scroll down using the volume down key until you find a row with the \".zip\" file with the file name shown within the app. (Usually, this is a file starting with \"OnePlusOxygen-\").\n\n- Installation of the update will start automatically. Restart your device. - When the installation of the update is finished, you\'ll be back at the Recovery Menu. Within the recovery menu, tap on \"Reboot\".\n\n- Your device will show its startup screen for a long time during starting up.\n\n- Afterwards, you\'ll see a white message with the title \"Android is upgrading\", while your apps are being optimized. Done. Enjoy the new Oxygen OS version! - After your device has finished optimizing its apps, the update has been successfully installed.\nTo verify this, you can check the current version of your system as following:\n\n- Go to Settings, tap on \"About Phone\", and check the Oxygen OS Version.\n\n- If you like this app, give it 5 stars at Google Play! Close Installation Guide The root package file you specified no longer exists. Please select a new root package above. Select a root package "If you want to keep your device rooted, you'll have to specify a root package above." Amount of RAM: Processor Frequency: %1$s %2$s %1$s GHz My device My device Device image Incremental OS version: Android version: OxygenOS version: (OTA: %s) Security patch date: Serial number: System on a Chip: unknown Your device: About this app The ultimate tool for Oxygen OS updates. This app is written by Arjan Vlek.\n\nThis app is a follow-up on another app of me, called Cyanogen Update Tracker. Cyanogen Update Tracker provides similar functionality for Cyanogen OS users.\n\n\nPlease note, this is not an official OnePlus application. \nThe OnePlus name, the OnePlus Logo and OxygenOS are property of OnePlus. \nAndroid, Google, Google Play and the Google Play logo are registered trademarks of Google Inc. \nThis app uses data from OnePlus and OPPO to show update information.\n\nIf you like my app, please rate it on Google play now: Rate on Google Play Version: %1$s New device released! The %1$s is now supported! Open the app to choose this device. Install or update Google Play services to enable push notifications. System update available %1$s is now available for the %2$s! Push notifications Displays all important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. These include system update notifications and breaking news notifications. Progress notifications Displays all non-important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. Contains the status indicators shown during downloading. Help Welcome to the help section of Oxygen Updater.\n\nHelp covers the following topics:\n\n• Updating your device\n• Reading the latest news\n• Viewing device information\n• Changing settings\n\nScroll down to browse through the topics. Updating your device When opening the app, you\'ll see if a system update is available. If an update is available, you can install it.\n\nTo start the installation, tap the \"Download\" button (below the update description) to start the download. When the download has finished, the installation screen pops up. If you left the app or the screen didn\'t pop up, tap the \"Install\" button, which is now shown next to the \"Download\" button.\n\nThe install screen will first check if you have a rooted device. If you have a rooted device, grant root permission when asked and choose how you want to install the update. Otherwise, follow the instructions for Manual install.\n\nAutomatic install:\nYou\'ll only have to choose your install options. The default settings are recommended, except that you have to specify the root package which needs to be (re)installed. Select a root package (zip file) using the blue folder button and tap on \"Start install\" to start the installation.\n\nManual install:\nYou\'ll see an installation guide on your screen. Write the instructions down and perform them as stated to install the update. Reading the latest news News is displayed to the left of the Update screen. The most recent items appear on top. Just tap on an item to read it.\nTap the back arrow or press your back key to return to the news items screen. Viewing information about your device You may view some of the specifications of your device using the screen to the right of the Update screen. This comes in handy when making a support request, during which you might be asked for some of the specifications of your device. Changing settings You can change your settings by tapping the three dots in the top right, following a tap on Settings.\nYou can change the following settings:\n\n• Device and update method\n• Push notifications\n• In app notifications\n• Privacy settings (log uploading).\n\nUse the switches to turn notification / privacy settings on and off. Select a device and / or update method using the dropdown menus shown above the switches. Dropdown menus not visible? Check your Internet connection and open the Settings screen again. News Author: %1$s Last update: %1$s This article has no contents. Failed to open article. Check your connection and press the \'RETRY\' button to open the article. Become a contributor Help improving Oxygen Updater Oxygen Updater needs your help! In order to give you the latest updates, we need to get the names of update files. These are present on your phone when a regular update pops up. \n\nHow can I help?\n\nOxygen Updater can automatically submit new update file names to our admins. This will use a small amount of data and may use a bit of your battery. All you need to do is waiting (approximataly 15 minutes) before installing official System Updates until you see a confirmation of Oxygen Updater that the file has been successfully submitted. Only the .ota-directory on your phone gets scanned once per 15 minutes. It only checks for a specific name in that particular folder. Upload files to the app server I\'d like to help and agree to submit update file names to our admins I\'d like to help improving the app and agree to submit update file names to our admins Save settings More info … Please grant the storage permissions in order to help improving the app Contribution successful Thanks for sharing the update file %1$s with our admins! Oh no! This version of the app is outdated. It\'s time to update it! Tap on \"Google Play\" below. Within Google Play, tap on \"Update\". No connection Failed to connect to the server. Please make sure you have a working connection. The app will now close. Retry Exit Google Play No connection. Server maintenance Please wait. The server will be available very soon. Failed to enable notifications. Fully close the app, and start it again after waiting a few minutes. Reload You can\'t rate the app, because the Google Play Store is missing on your device. Update already downloaded You have already downloaded this update, but not yet installed it. Tap on \"Install Guide\" to view how to install this update. Tap on \"Delete\" to permanently delete the file. Press the Back button to close this message. Delete Unsupported device It looks like your device is not running Oxygen OS. Please note that you can only install system updates on devices running Oxygen OS. \n\nOther devices, including OnePlus devices running Custom ROMs, are not supported. Don\'t show this warning again Root access Oxygen Updater offers easy, automated update installations for users with a rooted devices. However, incremental updates are not available for rooted devices. Oxygen Updater can check if you have root access to only offer appropriate update methods. \n\nIf you have root access, allow Oxygen Updater to obtain root access after closing this message. \n\nNo root access? Press \"Close\" and continue using the app. The purchase of the ad-free version failed, because an internal error occurred. Please try again in a few minutes.
